item.description:
Hola a todos!!,

Fiesta Mayo 9

Starting at 9 pm

Place: 608, Somerville Ave, Somerville.


La Bohemia is a great event that takes place every month in a Bar called Samba Bar in Somerville.
There's enough room for all of us to dance, practice our Spanish, meddle and have fun!!


The event starts with a projection of

Spanish Rock Videos,

featuring artists like Juanes,
Mana,
Julieta Venegas, or classics like
Soda Stereo,
Hombres G, or
Los Prisioneros.

After the videos There will be a live Colombian band called

"San Pelayo"

singing covers of "Carlos Vives" and other great Colombian singers

And of course we'll have those Salsa, merengue and rumba
songs that we love dance to .


Visit the website for more info:

LaBohemiaBoston.com


To see more of the vocalist of this band visit:
GregorioUribe.com
This place has a $10 cover charge, and $15 after 10:30 pm, so try to be early. (but it is worth it!!)
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be on the table right by the entrance with the "Meetup" sign
item.why: There will be a great Colombian band playing, with trumpets, guitars and its excellent vocalist Gregorio Uribe. The group is called "SAN PELAYO." They also show music videos projected in a large screen of well known Latin Pop and Rock singers.

group.name: The Boston Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: Let's delve into the Music of South America
